main.docTitle: Census and Statistics (Annual Earnings and Hours Survey) Order

section.name: s2
section.heading: Interpretation
section.def: business undertaking (業務事業單位) means an undertaking carrying on business in Hong Kong, including a non-profit-making body and a statutory body;
survey period (調查期) means the survey period specified in section 6.

section.name: s3
section.heading: Annual earnings and hours survey
section.content: The Commissioner must carry out a statistical survey every year in respect of business undertakings in Hong Kong for the purpose of compiling statistics relating to the wage level and distribution and the employment and demographic characteristics of employees in Hong Kong in the survey period.

section.name: s4
section.heading: Matters in respect of which information is required to be given

subsection.content: The matters in respect of which information must be given in a survey are the matters specified in the Schedule.

subsection.leadIn: The information must be given to the Commissioner—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: by completing such schedule as the Commissioner may issue for that purpose; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: by completing that schedule within such period as may be specified in the schedule.

section.name: s5
section.heading: Persons required to give information
section.leadIn: The following persons must give information in respect of a business undertaking for the purpose of a survey, if so requested by the Commissioner—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: if the business undertaking is a body corporate, any director, secretary or other person concerned in the management of the body corporate;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: if the business undertaking is a partnership, any partner of the partnership;

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: in any other case, the proprietor of the business undertaking.

section.name: s6
section.heading: Survey period
section.content: The survey period, in relation to a survey, is the period beginning on 1 April and ending on 30 June of the calendar year in which the survey is carried out.

section.name: s7
section.heading: Sampling methods may be used
section.content: The Commissioner may use sampling methods in the collection of statistical information under this Order.

section.name: s8
section.heading: Application of Order
section.content: This Order applies to a business undertaking that carried on business during the whole of a survey period or any part of it, regardless of whether the business undertaking commenced business before or after the commencement of the survey period and regardless of whether or not the business undertaking ceased to carry on business during the survey period.

section.name: s9
section.heading: Date for destruction of completed schedules
section.content: All completed schedules collected or received for a survey and all copies of the schedules must be destroyed not later than 24 months after the end of the survey period covered by that survey.

schedule.name: sch0
schedule.heading: Matters in respect of which Information is Required to be Given

section.name: s1
section.leadIn: Information pertaining to the business undertaking as a whole—

subsection.content: Name and address of the business undertaking.

Whether there had been significant changes in the employment or wage situation in the business undertaking during the 12 months preceding the survey reference period and, if so, what factors had contributed to the changes.

section.name: s2
section.leadIn: Information pertaining to each employee selected from the business undertaking—

subsection.content: Demographic characteristics (for example, sex, age and educational attainment).

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: whether employed by the business undertaking on a permanent, fixed term or casual basis;

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: whether employed by the business undertaking on a full-time or part-time basis;

paragraph.name: d
f
paragraph.leadIn: amount of wage for the relevant wage period, with breakdown—

subparagraph.name: ii
v
vi
subparagraph.content: cost of providing meal benefits in kind;

paragraph.name: g
paragraph.content: number of contractual working days per wage period and number of contractual working hours per day;

paragraph.name: h
paragraph.content: number of contractual working hours, and number of overtime hours, in the relevant wage period;

paragraph.name: i
paragraph.content: rate of overtime pay as a percentage of the rate of basic salary;

paragraph.name: j
paragraph.content: amount of end of year payment payable for the payment period within which the last day of the survey reference period falls.

section.name: s3
section.def: payment period (酬金期) means a period in respect of which an end of year payment is payable;

relevant wage period (相關工資期), in relation to an employee of a business undertaking, means the employee’s last wage period ending on or before the last day of the survey reference period applicable to the business undertaking;

survey reference period (調查參照期), in relation to a business undertaking, means either the month of April, May or June of the calendar year in which a survey is carried out as the Commissioner may specify in such schedule as the Commissioner may issue to the business undertaking for giving information for the purposes of the survey.
